meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jayne Lady Dave Treptow Sean Anderson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7157.

td.p: Jayne Lady, a web developer from Iowa City, Iowa
Dave Treptow, a technical project manager from Milwaukee, Wisconsin
Sean Anderson, a law professor from Champaign, Illinois (whose 2-day cash winnings total $48,300)

tr.td: "P"s ON EARTH
TOYS & GAMES
SPORTS HALL OF FAMERS
MOVERS & SHAKERS
PARTS OF THE WHOLE
2 CONSONANTS, ONE VOWEL

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [Revealing Dave\'s response] [*], who was the first to sign. Wrote it big, too.)
JayneWho is Alexander Hamilton?
$10,200
DaveWho is John Hancock?
$11,598
SeanWho is John Hancock?
$2,300
John Hancock')
